mapper.select: select b.blog_id,b.title,b.content,b.firstpicture,b.flag,b.views, b.appreciation,b.sharestatement,b.commenttabled,b.published,b.recommend,b.createtime, t1.type_id,t1.type_name,t3.tag_id,t3.tag_name, u.id,u.username,u.nickname,u.email,u.avatar from blog b left join user u on b.user_id=u.id left join type t1 on b.type_id=t1.type_id left join tag_blog_relation t2 on b.blog_id=t2.blog_id left join tag t3 on t2.tag_id=t3.tag_id where b.blog_id=#{blog_id}
